=======================================================

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DN9Qt3Q.png[/img]

[color=blue]Kritika's Summer Event!

1. Create a character and get 5,000 Gold!
Create a new character during the event and receive 5,000 Gold!

2. Get 30% additional items by purchasing the limited summer package!
You can get at least 30% additional items when you purchase the limited summer package.

---------------------------------------------------------

FEEL THE RUSH! KRITIKA: CHAOS UNLEASHED
KRITIKA UPDATE!!

[ New Character: Dark Valkyrie ]
The goddess of death binds you with her chains of seduction!
Dark Valkyrie has been unleashed!

[ 3v3 Melee Mode ]
You control the outcome! Jump into the intense heat of battle!
Flanked by sub characters, challenge the ranks of the 3v3 Melee Mode!

[ Master Level ]
One for all, and all for one! The effects apply to all your characters!
Experience the new level system and skills!

[ Sub Character System ]
Strengthening the sub characters means a stronger main character?!

* Feel the adrenaline at your fingertips!
- Play the most refreshing action RPG that will keep you breathless!
- Intense EX skills that jump off the screen! Call upon a friend's Striker to help you dominate!

* Meet the champions!
- The Dark Valkyrie. She seduces with her chains and judges with her scythe!
- The Berserker. Behold his rage as he destroys everything on sight!
- The Cat Acrobat. Quick and agile, fall in love with her spunky fighting moves!

* Experience a game system like no other!
- Grow stronger through 60 different stages!
- Play Monster Wave! Attack and defend yourself from an endless wave of monsters!
- Test your skills in Arena, Versus, and Melee! Become the ultimate champion!
- Use the Auto-Battle feature for convenient stage clearances![/color]
